document_data.name: Silifrey Sashenstar
document_data.mainbody: Lady '''Silifrey Sashenstar''' was a member of the [[Parliament of Peers]] from the noble [[patriar]] [[Sashenstar]] family of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
By the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Lady Silifrey Sashenstar was already a member of the Parliament of Peers. When the [[Absolute crisis]] arrived in the Gate, Lady Sashenstar was noted by the [[Cult of Bane]] as one of the eight top patriars of the Parliament, vulnerable to bribery, blackmail, or direct threats.

She was among nobles who attended Lord [[Enver Gortash]]'s correction in the [[Wyrm's Rock]] of Baldur's Gate in 1492 DR.
